1103460.name: Break my body
1103460.description:
Break my body renews the breakout game genre with tiles to protect, a power to fill up and a paddle that can extend its reach with a repulsive cloud.

In this medical breakout, you play professor Brick's assistant and try to treat a hopeless patient. John's got multiple cancer tumors and you need to destroy them cell by cell, without harming good cells. Release a radioactive ball with your magnetic paddle, send repulsive waves and use your antibiotic syringe.

Explore tons of creative levels, toy with physics: each zone to treat widens your gameplay with a new type of cell. Grab bonus drops but avoid malus ones. Special antibiotics drops are needed to replenish your syringe and protect healthy cells. Get ready for a deep challenge!



Features:
  • An antibiotic to protect your good cells; fill the syringe with antibiotic drops.
  • A magnetic pad with repulsive waves, at will.
  • 10 power-up drops to collect & 10 power-down drops to avoid.
  • 10 unique body zones with specific new cell types.
  • More than 100 levels with a leaderboard to showcase your best scores.
